title: Application crashes on startup
description: User reports that the mobile application crashes immediately after launching on an Android device running version 12.

title: Export to PDF function is not working
description: When a user tries to export a report to a PDF file, the button is unresponsive. No file is generated and no error message is displayed.

title: Request to add new user roles
description: The administrative team needs two new custom roles with specific permissions for managing reports and user accounts.

title: Search bar returns irrelevant results
description: The search function for products is failing to return relevant results based on keywords entered by the user.

title: Account verification email not sending
description: New users are not receiving the account verification email, preventing them from completing their registration.

title: Broken link on 'Help' page
description: The link to the 'Troubleshooting' section on the main 'Help' page leads to a 404 error.

title: Incorrect order total on receipt
description: The final total on a customer's digital receipt is incorrect. It is missing a discount that was applied during checkout.

title: Server performance degradation
description: The main application server is experiencing high load times during peak hours, causing a significant slowdown for all users.

title: Request for feature: two-factor authentication
description: Customers would like an option to enable two-factor authentication for enhanced account security.

title: User profile editing is bugged
description: Users are unable to save changes to their profile information. The 'Save' button is unresponsive.

title: Visual glitch on dashboard
description: A small visual glitch is present on the main dashboard where a graph is not rendering correctly, appearing as a blank space.

title: Missing products from category page
description: A specific category page is not displaying all of the products that are supposed to be listed under it.
